name: VMWare - SingleMachine Ubuntu
description: Create a VMWare Virtual Machine with Ubuntu

metadata.longDescription: Create a VMWare Virtual Machine with Ubuntu

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Cores - 1
      • Memory - 1GB
      • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Allows SSH from all sources
      • Egress - All
